msContents.summary: This is manuscript of the famous Bhāgavatpurāṇa. Some readings and the end verses of the 13th Skandha are different that the published edition of the Bhāgavatpurāṇa available at the Sanskrit documents web site. On the front cover number 101 is written in roman, in pink pencil.

filiation.p: Aufrecht Catalogus vol. 1 p.140 New Catalogus Catalogorum Vol 16.pp 242--247

support.p: Brown hard cover. Back cover folio is rough. The brown color layer is damaged. Scratches are seen. In front guard cover is damaged at the left corner. The verso of the guard covers has design of a creeping, flowers and leaves. Flowers are colored with red and rest stem and leaves are with yellow.

extent.measure: 2 guard folios, 9 blank folios, 246 written folios

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin. Folio 244 is also numbered in Devanagari script as the original number is damaged due to torn folio. On 246 folio something is written in Telugu script in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: Good state. Some folio are torn at the edges. Marginal holes have damaged the folio numbers. At the end number 244 is written in Devanagari in the left margin hence it was possible to know the exact folio number.

avighnamastu | kṛṣṇāya yadavendrāya jñānamudyāya yogine nāthāya rukmiṇaiśāya namonamaḥ vedāntacedine | janmādyasya yato nāvyāditarataścārtheṣvaBijña svarāt te
ne brahmahṛdāya ādikavaye muhyanti yat surayaḥ ||
śrībhāgavataṃnāradam pañcaviṃśati….
vārāhamekāśītisahasrakam ………
ṇa sandohaścaturlakṣamudāhṛtam | tatrāṣṭādaśasāhasryam śrībhāgavatamuttamam | idam bhāgavatam purvaṃ brahmaṇe nābhipañkaje | sthitāya bhavabhītāya kāruṇyātsarvapradarśitam ādima
dhyāvasāneṣu vairāgyakhyānasaṃyutam | harilīlākathāvrātāmṛtānadīta tatsuyam | sarvavedāntasāraṃ yat brahāmātmaikatvalakṣaṇam | vastvadvitiyaṃ tanniṣṭhaṃ kaivalyaikaprayojanaṃ pro
ṣṭhapadyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ hemasiṃhasamanvitam | dadāti yo bhagavataṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim | rājante tāvadanyāni purāṇāni satām gaṇe yāvanta dṛśyate sākṣātśrrīmatbhāgavataṃ param sa
rvavedāntasāraṃ hi śrimadbhāgavatamiṣyate ………|
nāmidantathā śrīmatbhāgavatam purāṇamamalaṃ yadvaiṣṇavānāṃpriayṃ yasmin pāramahaṃsyametadakhilam tattvaṃ paraṃ gīyante || yatra jñānavirāgabhaktisahitaṃ naiṣkarmmyamāvi
ṣkṛtantacśṛṇvan vipaṭhan vicāraṇaparo bhaktyā vimucyennaraḥ tasmai ye na vibhāsitoyamatulo jñānapradīpaḥ purā tadrūpeṇa ca nāradaya munaye kṛṣṇā
ya tadrūpiṇe yogīndrāya tadāmtanā ca bhagavadrātāya kāruṇyatas ca śuddhaṃ vimalaṃ viśokamamṛtaṃ satyaṃ parandhīmahiṃ | namastasmai bhagavate vāsudevāya sākṣiṇe ya ida
ndayayā tasma vyācacakṣe mumukṣave yogīndrāyanamastasmai śuklāya brahmarūpiṇe saṃsārasarppadaṣṭaṃ yo viṣṇurātamamūmucat || ௳ iti śrībhāgavatemahāpurāṇe a
